title: Couple With Heart Person Man No Skin Tone Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Person and man holding hands with heart
description: Depicts a couple, one person identified as a person and the other as a man, with a heart between them symbolizing love and romance. This version includes no skin tone modifiers.
apple_vendor_description: This variation of the couple with a heart emoji on Apple devices depicts a man with no skin tone and a woman with light skin tone, symbolizing unity and shared affection in a diverse and inclusive way.  Both figures are depicted with Apple's characteristic smooth, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading, creating a gentle and approachable aesthetic.  The prominent heart nestled between them gleams with a soft, inviting light, representing partnership, love, and mutual respect, ideal for celebrating relationships.
